title: John went out of his way to make me…

title: Exceeded Expecation
text: ACityDiscount exceeded all our expectations.  We initially purchased from this vendor because their pricing as the most reasonable.  Little did we know that they would provide amazing customer service as well.  We ordered a fairly large order of ice machines, and we were contacted by phone to verify our order and answer any questions.  Shipping was incredibly fast.  Communication through the whole processes was excellent.  ACityDiscount will be my first stop next time I'm looking for source equipment.

title: Great price Item as Adverrtised
text: Great price on the item we ordered with free shipping.  Arrived on time securely wrapped with no damage.

title: ACityDiscount goes above and beyond in…
text: ACityDiscount goes above and beyond in everything to do with quality customer service. They are friendly and supportive. They know their merchandise. We were relaxed because they kept in great contact with us all the way to delivery. What we ordered came and we couldn't be more happy.We highly recommend this company. Thank you all for dealing with us here in Vt. Take care... until we order again

title: Needed a New Ice Machine NOW - Problem Solved!
text: Our commercial ice machine failed and we needed a new one quickly - in the midst of a summer heatwave... ACityDiscount found us the right machine and had it delivered in less than a week - all other sites were quoting 6-12 week lead times. Thanks!  P.S. Brian Bennett was fantastic to work with - great follow-up and service delivery!

title: OUTSTANDING EXPERIENCE!
text: William and the warehouse guys were outstanding. I could not have asked for a better experience. The warehouse team who helped me went above what I expected to help me get loaded. I am a repeat customer and I WILL BE A REPEAT customer because of your staff and the quality products you carry IN STOCK! WOWKen NixGedney's Restaurant & Grill

title: Good Customer service

I was adequately updated on the shipping and delivery times, which was greatly appreciated. This was our second purchase from ACity Discount, both times we have had good customer service.

title: Excellent customer service
text: The website was easy to navigate and find exactly what i needed. I was very impressed that a representative called me before shipping just to review the order and make sure the product was definitely the right choice.

title: You had what I wanted

title: From order to arrival on site was a…

title: This purchase was made as a…Food warmer for church kitchen
text: This purchase was made as a representative of my church   My experience with ACity was excellent.  Sales Associate John Zheng was absolutely the best.  He helped me with many questions relating to our needs and was patient with my many questions and calls.   Communication was prompt from sales to delivery.  Five stars is not enough.

title: Service people were very helpful
text: Service people were very helpful. Bought and paid for the item online, and when I got to the store the next day it was there waiting for me.

title: Easy purchase fron begining to end

text: I ordered a commercial refrigerator for our restaurant. It was about $900 cheaper than anyone local, even with the shipping cost. It arrived in less than a week in good condition.

title: A good resource for our commercial product needs
text: Have made multiple purchases from this company. They are competitive but customer service is A+. They follow up and keep the customer well informed.

title: Extraordinary Service
text: I always have a great service experience at A City Discount.  The staff are knowledgeable and friendly and I get the best prices with amazing service.

title: Great Experience
text: John Z. was very receptive and all the information he conveyed on the item was accurate. It was quick delivery process and my items arrived as ordered in perfect condition.

title: I ordered what I needed
text: I ordered what I needed, discussed it some with sales rep. I made sure the exhaust fan would pull enough CFM’s. Paid for it. (Was easy) sales rep told me about delivery & them would call before coming.Everything unfolded just as sales rep said. Got fan right on time, I helped unload it. Did as rep said and opened box enough to see everything. I checked it over and gave it the ok looks good. We will attach the 110v cord take it up on roof. Remove old replace new, plug it in and it should solve all exhaust issues!!! And although it’s not quite done yet I feel confident enough that when we change exhaust fans out. Everything will be as good as new!!

title: Working with Rudy was a pleasure

title: A necessary DO-Over!
text: I've always said they send those surveys out WAY too fast for a good review.  Having received it on a Friday when I was a bit "bitter" but had no real path to recourse until Monday. I gave a "not so good" review.  Not hateful but certainly "CHEESED."The person who ordered this with me, Josh was wonderful.  I was in need of the Grill in an immediate way, so he worked with what he knew he had readily available, and that could be shipped for delivery a few days later.  I had issues with delivery. Being proactive I did have a smooth delivery. I Initially reported that this unit was manufactured in 2003, and in fact, the unit was manufactured in August of this year.   This HAD immediate issues with the center control, heating the grill to well over 500 degrees and it is now discolored, but I had IMMEDIATE response to these issues the very first call I made on the first business day these folks were available. The company they shipped this trough was great, but THEY DID NOT HAVE A PHONE NUMBER TO REACH ME!! I have an unusual Business Unique to FOB type deliveries.  Because I had all of the delivery information sent just after purchase, it was simple to call and speak directly to Dispatch. I had an email telling me it was out for delivery, STOP 13. As I began to worry it was easy to become proactive when all it took was phone call to resolve the connection issue and get the delivery.  I have ordered from ACityDiscount before, even though I had some bumps this time, I have to say all was resolved with IMMEDIATE action from both ACD  and Star Manufacturing.  DO note where I wanted a good grill that was priced less, I ended up getting a VERY good discount on a better grill, with a 2 year parts and labor warranty AND the repair will be done within a few days.  STAR even shipped a part in case the one we have is bad. GOOD treatment ALL the way around.  !!!!!

title: Best in Class Customer Service & Delivery
text: We purchased a Merchandiser Refrigerator which has a glass front and lots of shelves for chilling bottled water and cans of sodas/other beverages for our 55+ community center events.  These are great!  No coolers, no ice to buy, no spills to clean up or cause safety concerns. Get the one on caster wheels so you can move it around your location for whatever activity you have going on.  My sales associate was Brian Bennett and he was awesome!  I'd been looking for one of these for 7 months and was told by most companies they didn't have them in stock due to supply chain issues.  I found Brian in March and he gave me quotes of different sizes both with/without wheels. Very fair. The approvals for purchase took a while on our end, but once we gave him our credit card number he ordered right away and we received our merchandiser within a few days.  Over all an A+ 5-star rating for Brian Bennett for great customer service and follow through (plus patience!).  Highly recommend this product and this company.

title: ACD has excellent customer service
text: ACD has excellent customer service. We've been using them for years and they are a great go to, when you are looking for a new link in your supply chain. Brian Bennett and all of the sales folks are very professional and a pleasure to work with....and they have a  showroom with a small wares section because sometimes I want to see it, touch it, feel it.

title: 18” carving fork.
text: The product was wonderful, other than a few splits in the handle but it works great. Highly recommend this company and product.
